purpose: Provide end-to-end solutions for deploying and fine-tuning large language models (LLMs) in various industry contexts
principle: Utilizes popular frameworks and APIs such as Hugging Face and OpenAI to build and deploy LLMs with custom fine-tuning capabilities
reusability: Includes modular codebases and documentation for easy adaptation and integration in diverse AI projects
limitations: Primarily focuses on deployment and fine-tuning, might require additional resources for training from scratch
name: END-TO-END-GENERATIVE-AI-PROJECTS
description: End to End Generative AI Industry Projects on LLM Models with Deployment_Awesome LLM Projects
highlight: Comprehensive projects for deploying generative AI models with real-world applications
